languages.text: "Контроль теряют неудачники, когда боятся своего дара. Или идиоты, которые так и не разобрались, что они такое на самом деле. Ну или малые детки, которым охота поиграть в новую цацку. Если не знать предел своим способностям или постоянно скакать через собственную голову — вот тогда жди беды".

traits.locale_text: "Контроль теряют неудачники, когда боятся своего дара. Или идиоты, которые так и не разобрались, что они такое на самом деле. Ну или малые детки, которым охота поиграть в новую цацку. Если не знать предел своим способностям или постоянно скакать через собственную голову — вот тогда жди беды".
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Only losers who are afraid of their own gift lose control. Or idiots who never figure out what they are before it's too late. Or little kids who want to play around with their shiny new toy. If you don't know the limits of your abilities or you're always bouncing around in your own head, that's a recipe for disaster."
languages.original_text: "Контроль теряют неудачники, когда боятся своего дара. Или идиоты, которые так и не разобрались, что они такое на самом деле. Ну или малые детки, которым охота поиграть в новую цацку. Если не знать предел своим способностям или постоянно скакать через собственную голову — вот тогда жди беды".

Or little kids who want to play around with their shiny new toy. If you don't know the limits of your abilities or you're always bouncing around in your own head, that's a recipe for disaster."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “会失去控制的人，要么是惧怕自己能力的废物，要么是根本没搞清自己能力是什么的白痴，要么是总想瞎摆弄他们的新玩具的小屁孩。如果你不清楚自己能力的极限，或是总在你自己的脑子里瞎摆弄，那就一定会带来灾祸。”
languages.original_text: "Only losers who are afraid of their own gift lose control. Or idiots who never figure out what they are before it's too late. Or little kids who want to play around with their shiny new toy. If you don't know the limits of your abilities or you're always bouncing around in your own head, that's a recipe for disaster."

traits.locale_text: “会失去控制的人，要么是惧怕自己能力的废物，要么是根本没搞清自己能力是什么的白痴，要么是总想瞎摆弄他们的新玩具的小屁孩。如果你不清楚自己能力的极限，或是总在你自己的脑子里瞎摆弄，那就一定会带来灾祸。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: "Only losers who are afraid of their own gift lose control. Or idiots who never figure out what they are before it's too late. Or little kids who want to play around with their shiny new toy. If you don't know the limits of your abilities or you're always bouncing around in your own head, that's a recipe for disaster."

languages.text: «Solo los perdedores que temen su propio don pierden el control. O los idiotas que no se dan cuenta de que lo tienen hasta que es demasiado tarde. O los niños que quieren jugar con su nuevo juguete. Si no conoces los límites de tus capacidades o estás siempre metido en lo que percibes en tu cabeza, estás condenado».
languages.original_text: "Only losers who are afraid of their own gift lose control. Or idiots who never figure out what they are before it's too late. Or little kids who want to play around with their shiny new toy. If you don't know the limits of your abilities or you're always bouncing around in your own head, that's a recipe for disaster."

traits.locale_text: «Solo los perdedores que temen su propio don pierden el control. O los idiotas que no se dan cuenta de que lo tienen hasta que es demasiado tarde. O los niños que quieren jugar con su nuevo juguete. Si no conoces los límites de tus capacidades o estás siempre metido en lo que percibes en tu cabeza, estás condenado».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「自分の才能を恐れる敗者だけが制御を失うの。あるいは、手遅れになる前に自分が何者であるかを理解しない愚か者がね。もしくは、ピカピカの新しいおもちゃで遊びたがる小さな子供たちかしら。自分の能力の限界を知らなかったり、いつも自分の頭の中で跳ね回っていたりすれば、それは大惨事のもとよ」
languages.original_text: "Only losers who are afraid of their own gift lose control. Or idiots who never figure out what they are before it's too late. Or little kids who want to play around with their shiny new toy. If you don't know the limits of your abilities or you're always bouncing around in your own head, that's a recipe for disaster."

traits.locale_text: 「自分の才能を恐れる敗者だけが制御を失うの。あるいは、手遅れになる前に自分が何者であるかを理解しない愚か者がね。もしくは、ピカピカの新しいおもちゃで遊びたがる小さな子供たちかしら。自分の能力の限界を知らなかったり、いつも自分の頭の中で跳ね回っていたりすれば、それは大惨事のもとよ」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Nur Verlierer, die Angst vor ihrer eigenen Gabe haben, verlieren die Kontrolle. Oder Idioten, die erst herausfinden, was sie sind, wenn es zu spät ist. Oder kleine Kinder, die mit ihrem funkelnagelneuen Spielzeug spielen wollen. Wenn man die Grenzen seiner Fähigkeiten nicht kennt oder ständig in seinem eigenen Kopf umherhüpft, kann das nur in der Katastrophe enden."
languages.original_text: "Only losers who are afraid of their own gift lose control. Or idiots who never figure out what they are before it's too late. Or little kids who want to play around with their shiny new toy. If you don't know the limits of your abilities or you're always bouncing around in your own head, that's a recipe for disaster."

traits.locale_text: "Nur Verlierer, die Angst vor ihrer eigenen Gabe haben, verlieren die Kontrolle. Oder Idioten, die erst herausfinden, was sie sind, wenn es zu spät ist. Oder kleine Kinder, die mit ihrem funkelnagelneuen Spielzeug spielen wollen. Wenn man die Grenzen seiner Fähigkeiten nicht kennt oder ständig in seinem eigenen Kopf umherhüpft, kann das nur in der Katastrophe enden."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Il n'y a que les minables qui craignent leur propre don perdent le contrôle. Ou les imbéciles qui ont compris trop tard ce qu'ils étaient. Ou les gamins qui veulent s'amuser avec leur nouveau jouet. C'est sûr que ceux qui ne connaissent pas les limites de leurs propres pouvoirs ou qui sont trimballés à droite et à gauche dans leur propre tête ne risquent pas de faire de vieux os. »
languages.original_text: "Only losers who are afraid of their own gift lose control. Or idiots who never figure out what they are before it's too late. Or little kids who want to play around with their shiny new toy. If you don't know the limits of your abilities or you're always bouncing around in your own head, that's a recipe for disaster."

traits.locale_text: « Il n'y a que les minables qui craignent leur propre don perdent le contrôle. Ou les imbéciles qui ont compris trop tard ce qu'ils étaient. Ou les gamins qui veulent s'amuser avec leur nouveau jouet. C'est sûr que ceux qui ne connaissent pas les limites de leurs propres pouvoirs ou qui sont trimballés à droite et à gauche dans leur propre tête ne risquent pas de faire de vieux os. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Yalnızca kendi yeteneklerinden korkan ezikler, iş işten geçmeden önce kendi tabiatlarını kavrayamayan ahmaklar ya da yepyeni oyuncağıyla oynamak isteyen minik veletler kontrolü kaybeder. Hünerlerinin sınırını bilmiyorsan ya da kafanın içindekilere kapılıp gidiyorsan muhakkak ki başına gelecek vardır."
languages.original_text: "Only losers who are afraid of their own gift lose control. Or idiots who never figure out what they are before it's too late. Or little kids who want to play around with their shiny new toy. If you don't know the limits of your abilities or you're always bouncing around in your own head, that's a recipe for disaster."

traits.locale_text: "Yalnızca kendi yeteneklerinden korkan ezikler, iş işten geçmeden önce kendi tabiatlarını kavrayamayan ahmaklar ya da yepyeni oyuncaklarıyla oynayıp durmak isteyen küçük çocuklar kontrolü kaybeder. Kabiliyetlerinin sınırını bilmiyorsan ya da kafanın içindeki düşüncelere hâkim olamıyorsan muhakkak ki başına gelecek vardır."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
